H

HarvestAction - Class in game.actions
Special Action that allows Actor to harvest a ripe crop for food.
HarvestAction(Location) - Constructor for class game.actions.HarvestAction
Create a HarvestAction object using a Location that specifies the location where a ripe crop is to be harvested.
HarvestBehaviour - Class in game.behaviours
A class that generates a HarvestAction if the current Actor is standing on or next to a ripe Crop.
HarvestBehaviour() - Constructor for class game.behaviours.HarvestBehaviour
 
Human - Class in game
Class representing an ordinary human.
Human(String) - Constructor for class game.Human
The default constructor creates default Humans
HuntBehaviour - Class in game.behaviours
Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
HuntBehaviour(Class<?>, int) - Constructor for class game.behaviours.HuntBehaviour
 
hurt(int) - Method in class game.Zombie
New feature is added to this overriding method if it's hurt, it has 50% of chances of losing a limb
